Milk chocolate

results.title: Christmas Chocolate Shards |  Decorated Chocolate  |  Star Chocolate  |  Chocolate with Print
results.description:
Beautifully decorated chocolate shards that feature a very festive star design.

These chocolate shards are delicious, thin sheets of chocolate that melt in the mouth. They are made be hand in our little chocolate kitchen in Yorkshire. 

You will receive 100g of chocolate shards, featuring a Christmas star design that is made from cocoa butter. Displayed in a block-bottomed cellophane bag, finished with lovely seasonal ribbon (designs may vary) and a Melting House sticker.

Ingredients: 
Milk chocolate version (sugar, cocoa butter, whole milk* powder, cocoa mass, emulsifier: soya* lecithin, natural vanilla flavour), cocoa butter star print (E171,E110,E102). 

Dark chocolate version: (cocoa mass, sugar cocoa butter, emulsifier: soya* lecithin, natural vanilla flavour), cocoa butter star print (E171,E110,E102). 

* denotes potential allergens

Allergy information: Made in a chocolate kitchen where flour, nuts and dairy are used.

results.title: Peppermint Candy Cane Chocolate Slab Bar
results.description:
This would make a lovely stocking filler to discover on Christmas morning! 

A 100g bar of Belgian milk chocolate with a whole peppermint candy cane and covered in Christmassy sprinkles. Wrapped in a cellophane bag, tied with festive red ribbon (designs may vary).

Made by hand in our little chocolate kitchen in Yorkshire.

Ingredients:
milk chocolate (sugar, cocoa butter, whole milk* powder, cocoa mass, emulsifier: soya* lecithin, natural vanilla flavour), candy cane (sugar, glucose syrup, colours: carmines, titanium dioxide, cooper complexes of chlorophyllins, natural peppermint flavour), sugar sprinkles.

Made in a kitchen where flour, nuts and dairy are used.

results.title: Santa's Chocolate Coal - Christmas Stocking Filler or Secret Santa | Naughty or Nice Gift | Kids Present
results.description:
Do you know someone who has been naughty this year?!

We all know what Santa brings for those who haven't made the nice list... a lump of coal!

However, these are delicious lumps of edible coal. Made from chunks of yummy honeycomb dipped in finest Belgian milk chocolate and then rolled in coal dust (aka black sugar crystals). These are made by hand in our kitchen in Yorkshire.

This would be a perfect stocking filler.

We can even include a personalised printed gift tag with your order, just add a little message to the 'notes to seller' box (up to a maximum of 140 characters).

You will get 150g of coal in a cellophane bag, tied with festive ribbon (design may vary) and labelled 'Santa's Chocolate Coal'. 

These lovely treats have a best before date of at least February 2017, so will last long after Christmas - if they aren't gobbled up on the big day!

Made by hand in our chocolate kitchen in the heart of Yorkshire.

Ingredients: 
Honeycomb (sugar, glucose syrup, sodium bicarbonate), milk chocolate (sugar, cocoa butter, whole milk* powder, cocoa mass, emulsifier: soya* lecithin, natural vanilla flavour), black sugar crystals (sugar, mallic acid, colouring E153). 
Made in a kitchen where flour, nuts and dairy are used.

results.title: Chocolate Sprouts stocking filler - novelty secret Santa gift - handmade chocolate
results.description:
Do you love sprouts or hate them?! We think you will definitely love these novelty chocolate sprouts! 

Each bag contains white chocolate truffles, each filled with a delicious ganache. Choose from either a white chocolate vanilla filling or milk chocolate filling. 

They have been hand-dipped using green cocoa butter to resemble the most famous of festive veg!

Perfect as a secret Santa gift or a stocking filler, and we promise they don't taste anything like sprouts. If you are buying them for Christmas, this item will have a best before date of at least the end February 2017. 

Packaged in a clear cellophane bag with green raffia tie.

95g (approximately 7 truffles)

results.title: Praline Chocolate Sprouts | Truffles Gift Box
results.description:
The most famous festive veg... but these are delicious chocolate praline versions! Complete in a beautiful gift box, they would make a lovely Christmas gift.

This listing is for a white gift box with gold interior and tied with ribbon containing 20 chocolate truffles, each filled with delicious hazelnut praline ganache. 

They have been hand-dipped using green cocoa butter to resemble sprouts!

Perfect as a secret Santa gift or a Christmas treat for a family, and we promise they don't taste anything like sprouts. If you are buying them for Christmas, this item will have a best before date of at least the end February 2017.

Check out our other listing for a bag of chocolate sprouts, perfect as a stocking filler: https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/259298368/chocolate-sprouts-stocking-filler

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by hand in our chocolate kitchen in Yorkshire.

Produced in a kitchen where flour, dairy and nuts are also used.

results.title: Christmas Eve Gift - Personalised Hot Chocolate Spoon | Add a name to the label |
results.description:
A wonderful treat for Christmas Eve!  

This listing is for an individual hot chocolate spoon with marshmallows that features a personalised label, e.g. 'Lydia's Christmas Eve Hot Chocolate Spoon'. Simply tell us the name of the person in the NOTES TO SELLER box.

Our delicious hot chocolate is made by hand with finest Belgian chocolate.

Simply heat a mug of milk and stir the spoon in. Give it a good, long stir to let the chocolate really melt, then top with the marshmallows and you'll have a creamy, decadent hot chocolate that will warm your cockles!

Choose from:
Milk chocolate
White chocolate
Salted caramel
Orange
Gingerbread (featuring a mini white choc gingerbread man!)
White chocolate peppermint candy cane
Milk chocolate peppermint candy cane

Check out our other listing for a Christmas Eve family chocolate hamper: http://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/474696304/chocolate-hamper-christmas-eve-gift-box

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by hand in our kitchen in Yorkshire.

Allergy information: Made in a chocolate kitchen where flour, nuts and dairy are used.

results.description:
This Christmas pudding makes a great personalised bauble or place setting for Christmas dinner. We often make these for every member of a family.

Belgian milk chocolate in the shape of a Christmas pudding, decorated with white chocolate and coloured cocoa butter holly. We then hand pipe the name of a loved one on to the pudding - just let us know the name in the NOTES TO SELLER box at checkout (max. 10 characters).

The pudding comes in a cellophane bag, complete with ribbon. There is also a small ribbon loop to hang the pudding from the tree.

Approximately 100g in weight.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by hand in our chocolate kitchen in Yorkshire.

results.title: Hot Chocolate Mix | Gourmet Drinking Chocolate | Cocoa gift | Handmade | Choose your flavour |
results.description:
A warm hug in a mug! Our delicious hot chocolate mix is made by hand with finest Belgian chocolate.

Simply heat a mug of milk and scoop a generous tablespoon of the chocolate flakes (25g) into the hot milk. Give it a good, long stir to let the chocolate really melt and you'll have a creamy, decadent hot chocolate that will warm your cockles!

This box of hot chocolate mix contains 250g which should make roughly ten drinks.

Choose from:
Salted Caramel
Gingerbread
Orange
Milk Chocolate
Dark Chocolate

Our dark and single origin options are vegan friendly. However, they are made in a kitchen in which we also produce milk chocolate so there may be a chance of very low level cross-contamination.

Check out our other listings for a set of three mixes that would be an indulgent Christmas gift!

results.title: Choose 3 flavours | Gourmet Hot Chocolate Mix | Drinking Chocolate | Handmade
results.description:
A warm hug in a mug! Our delicious hot chocolate mix is made by hand with finest Belgian chocolate.

Simply heat a mug of milk and scoop a generous tablespoon of the chocolate flakes (25g) into the hot milk. Give it a good, long stir to let the chocolate really melt and you'll have a creamy, decadent hot chocolate that will warm your cockles!

This listing is for 3 boxes - a saving of £4. Each box of hot chocolate mix contains 250g which should make roughly ten drinks.

Choose THREE flavours from:
Salted Caramel
Gingerbread
Orange
Milk Chocolate
Single origin dark chocolate (Madagascan 67%)
Dark Chocolate

Just specify your chosen flavours in the 'Notes to seller' box when purchasing.

Our dark and single origin options are vegan friendly. However, they are made in a kitchen in which we also produce milk chocolate so there may be a chance of very low level cross-contamination.

Produced in a kitchen where flour and nuts are also used.

results.title: Santa's Chocolate Coal - Christmas Stocking Filler or Secret Santa | Naughty or Nice Gift | Kids Present
results.description:
Do you know someone who has been naughty this year?!

We all know what Santa brings for those who haven't made the nice list... a lump of coal!

However, these are delicious lumps of edible coal. Made from chunks of yummy honeycomb dipped in finest Belgian milk chocolate and then rolled in coal dust (aka black sugar crystals). These are made by hand in our kitchen in Yorkshire.

This would be a perfect stocking filler.

We can even include a personalised printed gift tag with your order, just add a little message to the 'notes to seller' box (up to a maximum of 140 characters).

You will get 150g of coal in a cellophane bag, tied with festive ribbon (design may vary) and labelled 'Santa's Chocolate Coal'. 

These lovely treats have a best before date of at least February 2017, so will last long after Christmas - if they aren't gobbled up on the big day!

Made by hand in our chocolate kitchen in the heart of Yorkshire.

Ingredients: 
Honeycomb (sugar, glucose syrup, sodium bicarbonate), milk chocolate (sugar, cocoa butter, whole milk* powder, cocoa mass, emulsifier: soya* lecithin, natural vanilla flavour), black sugar crystals (sugar, mallic acid, colouring E153). 
Made in a kitchen where flour, nuts and dairy are used.

results.title: Hot Chocolate Mix | Gourmet Drinking Chocolate | Cocoa gift | Handmade | Choose your flavour |
results.description:

This box of hot chocolate mix contains 250g which should make roughly ten drinks.

Choose from:
Salted Caramel
Gingerbread
Orange
Milk Chocolate
Dark Chocolate

Our dark and single origin options are vegan friendly. However, they are made in a kitchen in which we also produce milk chocolate so there may be a chance of very low level cross-contamination.

Check out our other listings for a set of three mixes that would be an indulgent Christmas gift!

results.title: Santa's Chocolate Coal - Christmas Stocking Filler or Secret Santa | Naughty or Nice Gift | Kids Present
results.description:
Do you know someone who has been naughty this year?!

We all know what Santa brings for those who haven't made the nice list... a lump of coal!

However, these are delicious lumps of edible coal. Made from chunks of yummy honeycomb dipped in finest Belgian milk chocolate and then rolled in coal dust (aka black sugar crystals). These are made by hand in our kitchen in Yorkshire.

This would be a perfect stocking filler.

We can even include a personalised printed gift tag with your order, just add a little message to the 'notes to seller' box (up to a maximum of 140 characters).

You will get 150g of coal in a cellophane bag, tied with festive ribbon (design may vary) and labelled 'Santa's Chocolate Coal'. 

These lovely treats have a best before date of at least February 2017, so will last long after Christmas - if they aren't gobbled up on the big day!

Made by hand in our chocolate kitchen in the heart of Yorkshire.

Ingredients: 
Honeycomb (sugar, glucose syrup, sodium bicarbonate), milk chocolate (sugar, cocoa butter, whole milk* powder, cocoa mass, emulsifier: soya* lecithin, natural vanilla flavour), black sugar crystals (sugar, mallic acid, colouring E153). 
Made in a kitchen where flour, nuts and dairy are used.

results.title: Chocolate Sprouts stocking filler - novelty secret Santa gift - handmade chocolate
results.description:
Do you love sprouts or hate them?! We think you will definitely love these novelty chocolate sprouts! 

Each bag contains white chocolate truffles, each filled with a delicious ganache. Choose from either a white chocolate vanilla filling or milk chocolate filling. 

They have been hand-dipped using green cocoa butter to resemble the most famous of festive veg!

Perfect as a secret Santa gift or a stocking filler, and we promise they don't taste anything like sprouts. If you are buying them for Christmas, this item will have a best before date of at least the end February 2017. 

Packaged in a clear cellophane bag with green raffia tie.

95g (approximately 7 truffles)

results.title: Praline Chocolate Sprouts | Truffles Gift Box
results.description:
The most famous festive veg... but these are delicious chocolate praline versions! Complete in a beautiful gift box, they would make a lovely Christmas gift.

This listing is for a white gift box with gold interior and tied with ribbon containing 20 chocolate truffles, each filled with delicious hazelnut praline ganache. 

They have been hand-dipped using green cocoa butter to resemble sprouts!

Perfect as a secret Santa gift or a Christmas treat for a family, and we promise they don't taste anything like sprouts. If you are buying them for Christmas, this item will have a best before date of at least the end February 2017.

results.title: Choose 3 flavours | Gourmet Hot Chocolate Mix | Drinking Chocolate | Handmade
results.description:
A warm hug in a mug! Our delicious hot chocolate mix is made by hand with finest Belgian chocolate.

Simply heat a mug of milk and scoop a generous tablespoon of the chocolate flakes (25g) into the hot milk. Give it a good, long stir to let the chocolate really melt and you'll have a creamy, decadent hot chocolate that will warm your cockles!

This listing is for 3 boxes - a saving of £4. Each box of hot chocolate mix contains 250g which should make roughly ten drinks.

Choose THREE flavours from:
Salted Caramel
Gingerbread
Orange
Milk Chocolate
Single origin dark chocolate (Madagascan 67%)
Dark Chocolate

Just specify your chosen flavours in the 'Notes to seller' box when purchasing.

Our dark and single origin options are vegan friendly. However, they are made in a kitchen in which we also produce milk chocolate so there may be a chance of very low level cross-contamination.

Produced in a kitchen where flour and nuts are also used.
